Module cerei
Package au.org.nifpi.cerei

Class MeterSummary

java.lang.Object
au.org.nifpi.cerei.MeterSummary
public class MeterSummary extends Object
Holds summary cost OR PEI results for each meter. Could do with refactoring so that there is a base class with child classes for each of cost and PEI
Author:
James Sargeant

    • addCost

      public void addCost(CostPerMonth[] costsPerMonth)
      Process the relevant detailed cost structure and calculate the monthly, quarterly and yearly costs
      Parameters:

    • addEei

      public void addEei(PEIPerMonth[] peisPerMonth) throws Exception
      Process the relevant detailed cost structure and calculate the monthly, quarterly and yearly PEIs
      Parameters:
      peisPerMonth - The detailed pei information associated with this meter
      Throws:
      Exception - Rethrows exceptions from called methods - most likely divide by zero exception when calculating PEIs
